about_the_game:
Wanda Kurtz, also known as Venus of the Furs, built a sexual empire along the legendary River of Pleasure. For years, she was the most influential figure of the High Libido Command in that region. However, after discovering a psychotronic technology capable of converting explicit sex into energy, Venus decided to abandon her position and create her own business model. During her spectacular escape, she attracted the attention of sexual addicts with the bioenergetic potential of this new technology.

With this innovation, sexual pleasure is not only intensified; users can now manipulate human nature in unprecedented ways. Venus discovered that the human body, at the height of sexual climax, releases a vast amount of bioelectric and psychic energy. This energy not only affects the body but also influences surrounding energetic fields, such as electromagnetic waves and quantum fields. Thus, a new technology called Sexual Psychotronics was born, where futuristic devices capture the bioenergy generated during sexual acts and amplify it for various purposes, from creating powerful psychic weapons to enhancing mental abilities.

The devices, connected to the partners’ bodies, channel this energy for diverse purposes, converting excitement and climax into psychokinetic or telepathic power. Among Venus’s inventions, the most impressive was a teleportation machine activated by sex, which transported her to the headwaters of the River of Pleasure, beyond the reach of the High Command. However, the machine malfunctioned upon arrival, causing Venus’s ethereal fragments to be scattered across the Valley of Pleasure.

Now, her loyal lover must use the same psychotronic technology to reassemble Venus’s fragmented body, which remains trapped in a quantum limbo. The Valley is saturated with traces of her presence, and only psychotronic sex can bring her back. Sexual Psychotronics have amplified Venus of the Furs’ powers, allowing her to manipulate reality itself – even foreseeing her nemesis in the not-too-distant future.

This is a first-person game with URP quality, where the player assumes the role of the extraordinary Lingam, the skilled lover of Venus of the Furs. Your mission is to recover the fragments of Venus scattered throughout the Valley of Pleasure, using the technology of Psychotronic Sex. In addition to his own knowledge, Lingam will rely on Venus's psychic guidance to lead him on his journey. He must also search the valley for retro-technological relics, created during the failed attempt to reintegrate Venus's body.

Explore every corner of the Valley in search of artifacts, using a psychotronic tracking device. The collection of fragments will be manual, and the player must gather everything at the teleportation machine, which still needs repair. Store items in your inventory and collect as many clues as possible. Listen to Venus through various means: she has become omnipresent, even without her body fully restored. To progress, it will be necessary to interact with spectral projections of Venus, which appear in brief bursts of psychotronic manifestation.

The game features an inventory system and quality settings, FPS options, and other resources that enhance the experience in this quantum event.🤩

content_descriptors.notes: “The characters are practically naked or half-naked. Frequent nudity, because the characters live in a sexual world where they survive with what they can. The game has some situations of explicit and non-explicit sex. Sex Simulations content is explicit or graphic...”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7, 2.67 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 2070 or Superior
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: Before being hunted by Charlotte, Venus built a psychotronic empire that transforms sex into pure psychic bioelectric energy. This energy allowed her to teleport to a remote station at the head of the Pleasure River. The problem is, her body is still fragmented in limbo and needs to be reintegrated.
